place.name: LITTLE BITTERING
place.gazetteerText: BITTERING (Little), a parish in Mitford district, Norfolk; 3 miles N by E of Wendling r. station, and 5 NW of East Dereham. Post Town, Litcham, under Swaffham. Acres, 398. Rated property, £384. Pop., 30. Houses, 3. The property is all in one estate. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Norwich. Value, £100. Patron, James Dover, Esq. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
